Title: Modified digital backpropagation accounting for polarization-mode dispersion
Abstract: © 2017 OSA.We propose a modified DBP algorithm accounting for PMD. The accumulated PMD at the receiver is factorized into several PMD sections, and inserted into the DBP routine to distributively compensate for PMD, outperforming the conventional approach by 1.1 dB in SNR.
